import React, { useState } from 'react'; import DatePicker from 'react-datepicker'; import 'react-datepicker/dist/react-datepicker.css'; const TransactionForm = ({ selectedBus, noOfPassenger, tripDate, email, handleNoOfPassengerChange, handlePassengerChange, handleSubmit, }) => { const [passengerList, setPassengerList] = useState([]); const handleAddPassenger = () => { setPassengerList((prevList) => [...prevList, {}]); }; const handleRemovePassenger = (index) => { setPassengerList((prevList) => prevList.filter((_, i) => i !== index)); }; return (

Transaction Form

handleNoOfPassengerChange(parseInt(e.target.value))} />
setTripDate(date)} minDate={new Date()} className="form-control" />
setEmail(e.target.value)} />
{passengerList.map((passenger, index) => (

Passenger {index + 1}

handlePassengerChange(index, 'passengerName', e.target.value) } />
handlePassengerChange(index, 'passengerAge', parseInt(e.target.value)) } />
))}
); }; export default TransactionForm;
